name: Touzoku to 1000-biki no Pokémon
summary: Touzoku to 1000-biki no Pokémon (literally The Thieves and the 1000 Pokémon) is a discontinued free Generation VI Pokémon series game, with StreetPass support. It is based on the movie Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction. It was only released in Japan.
